paper_abstract: By 1965, having successfully combined work-at EMCC, Burroughs, and Philco-with the task of raising a family when such a combination was still somewhat of a rarity, the author went on to become a consultant in the Boston area. In this last installment of her memoirs, she describes working with different data management systems, culminating with her employment at Harvard University for 27 years.
paper_title: CDC, Raytheon, and Harvard University: Three early data management systems
